284b3(mdo sde): snang ba yod pa ma yin pas/ /khyod kyi rnam rtog mi 'byung ngo / /thog ma med ldan 'dus byas la/ /gal te khyod kyi rtog nor na/ //dngos po dngos nyid su zhig gis/ /'khor
284b4(mdo sde): byas thub chen bdag la gsungs/ /dngos po dngos nyid med pa ste/ /sems tsam po ni snang ba yin/ /rang gi sems ni ma mthong bas/ /rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug /ji ltar
284b5(mdo sde): byis pas brtags pa yi/ /brtags pa gal te yod med cing / /de las rnam pa gzhan yod na/ /blos kyang rtog par mi rung ngo / /'phags pa gal te de yod na/ /de ni byis
284b6(mdo sde): pas brtags ma yin/ /gal te 'phags las de log na/ /'phags dang byis pa mnyam par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sems ni rnam sbyangs pa/ /'phags pa rnams la nor pa
284b7(mdo sde): med| |sems kyi rgyud ni ma dag pa'i/ /byis pa brtags la rtog par byed/ /ji ltar bu la ma zhig ni/ /mkha' la shing thog len byed cing / /'di re bu gcig ma ngu
285a1(mdo sde): bar| |shing thog sna tshogs 'di yang long / /de bzhin sems can kun la ngas/ /brtags pa'i 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis/ /bris nas yod
285a2(mdo sde): dang med pa yi/ /phyogs spangs tshul ni rab tu bshad/ /gang gi ma byung rkyen rnams kyis/ /'byung ste 'brel las ma yin na/ /sngon ma skyes pa da skyes te/ /bdag nyid
285a3(mdo sde): du yang red pa med/ /bdag nyid ma rnyed skyes pa med/ /rkyen med par yang gang na'ang med/ /skyes pa'i dngos po de dag kyang / /rkyen med par yang gang na'ang med/ /
285a4(mdo sde): de lta bu yi mdor mthong na/ /gang na med min yod min min/ /dngos po rkyen las skye bar ni/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis mi brtag go /mu stegs can rnams byis pa
285a5(mdo sde): la| |rkyen gyis gcig dang tha dad gtam/ /zer yang 'gro ba rmi lam dang / /sgyu ma 'dra bar mi shes so/ /brjod pa'i yul gyi theg pa ni/ /theg pa chen po bla na med//
285a6(mdo sde): ngas ni don kyang legs par bstan/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /gang dag 'jungs pa'i nyan thos dang / /mu stegs can gyis byas pa na/ /gang phyir rtog gis bshad
285a7(mdo sde): pas na/ /de dag don la 'khrul pa'o/ /mtshan nyid dang ni dngos dbyibs dang / /ming ni rnam pa bzhi po yang / /de dag la ni dmigs byas shing / /rnam par rtog pa rab tu
285b1(mdo sde): 'jug / gang rnams gcig dang du ma dang / /tshangs pa'i ris la dbang sgyur zhing / /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od dag kyang / /gang 'jig byed pa sras ma yin/ /'phags pa'i mthong ba
285b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs rig cing / /'du shes zlog la mkhas pa rnams/ /rnam par rtog pa'i mchog phyin cing / /de ni nga yi bstan pa la/ /sras po grol
285b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam grol zhing / /'ong dang 'gro ba rnam spangs pa'o/ /gzugs kyi rnam shes phyir ldog nas/ /gal te las ni 'jig 'gyur na/ /rtag dang
285b4(mdo sde): mi rtag par mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba dag kyang med 'gyur ro/ /ldog pa'i tshe ni zhig gyur pa/ /gzugs kyi yul las phyir ldog ste/ /yod med nyes dang bral ba'i las/ /kun gzhi
285b5(mdo sde): la ni rab tu gnas/ /srid pa'i gnas su rnam shes dang / /gzugs lhun rab tu 'jig pa ste/ /gzugs dang rnam shes 'brel pa yi/ /las ni 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /
285b6(mdo sde): gal te de dag dang 'brel ba'i/ /mi yi las ni 'jig 'gyur na/ /las kyi 'brel pa zhig pa'i phyir/ /'khor med mya ngan 'da' ba'ang med/ /zhig kyang de dang lhan cig tu/ /gal
285b7(mdo sde): te 'khor bar skye 'gyur na/ /gzugs ni de dang 'brel ba'i phyir/ /tha mi dad pas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sems ni gzugs su rnam rtog las/ /gcig pa ma yin tha dad min/ /yod
286a1(mdo sde): dang med pa'i phyogs spangs phyir/ /dngos po rnams la 'jig pa med/ /kun tu brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang / /phan tshun mtshan nyid tha mi dad/ /
286a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyi mi rtag nyid bzhin te/ /gcig la gcig kyang skyed byed pa'o/ /gcig dang tha dad rnam grol ba'i/ /brtags pa khong du mi chud na/ /yod dang med par ji ltar 'gyur//
286a3(mdo sde): gzugs kyi mi rtag nyid bzhin no/ /brtags pa shin tu mthong 'gyur na/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni mi skye'o/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni rab mthong na/ /brtags pa de bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /
286a4(mdo sde): rtog pa rnam par 'jig pa na/ /nga yi tshul kyang rnam 'jig byed/ /nga yi bstan pa 'di la ni/ /sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs pa yin/ /gang na gang tshe de 'dra ba/ /chos la sun
286a5(mdo sde): 'byin yod pa'i rnams/ /nga yi tshul ni 'jig par byed/ /de dag kun dang 'gro mi bya/ /gang zhig sgro 'dogs skur pa 'debs/ /brtags pa rnam par 'jig byed dang / /
286a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa dag tu gtam mi bya/ /dge slong don la spang bar bya/ /skra shad 'dzings dang sgyu 'dra dang / /rmi lam 'dra zhing dri za 'dra/ /rtog pa smig rgyu snang 'dra la/ /gang dag yod
286a7(mdo sde): dang med lta bu/ /de dag sdud par su spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi la de mi slob/ /de dag mtha' gnyis lhung ba ste/ /gzhan yang rnam par 'jig par byed/ /brtags pa'i dngos
286b1(mdo sde): po rab dben zhing / /dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba/ /rnal 'byor can ni sus mthong ba/ /de dag bsdu bar spyad par gyis/ /mu tig nor bu gser 'byung ba'i/ /'byung kun
286b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten na yod pa/ /sna tshogs las kyi rgyus ma byung / /bus pa rnams kyi 'tsho ba ltar/ /de bzhin sems can rigs rnams ni/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las gyis spangs/ /snang ba
286b3(mdo sde): med phyir las med do/ /las las byung ba'i 'gro ba'ang med/ /ji ltar 'phags pas rnam sgom ltar/ /dngos po'i dngos nyid med mod kyi/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar//
286b4(mdo sde): dngos po dag ni yod pa'o/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/ /gal te dngos po med na ni/ /dngos po thams cad med pas na/ /su la'ang nyon mongs par 'gyur te/ /
286b5(mdo sde): dngos po sna tshogs nyon mongs las/ /'khor ba dbang po nyer 'gro ba/ /mi shes pa dang srid 'brel ni/ /lus can rnams kyi 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa
286b6(mdo sde): ltar| |gang gi dngos po yod min pa/ /de dag dbang po 'jug pa med/ /rnal 'byor nyid kyang 'jug pa med/ /bcom ldan gal te 'khor ba yi/ /rgyu yi dngos po ma mchis na//
286b7(mdo sde): byis pa nan tan ma bgyis par/ /byed pa spangs pa'i thar par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi 'phags pa byis pa'i khyad/ /dngos po med na ji ltar mchis/ /rnam par thar pa gsum spyod
287a1(mdo sde): pa'i| |'phags pa dag la dngos po med/ /phung po gang zag chos rnams dang / /rang dang spyi yi mtshan nyid med/ /dbang po rnams dang rkyen gyi rnams//
287a2(mdo sde): nyan thos dag la ngas bshad do/ /rgyu med pa dang sems tsam dang / /'byor pa rnams dang sa rnams dang / /so so rang gi de bzhin nyid/ /dag pa rgyal ba'i sras la bshad/ /
287a3(mdo sde): nga yi bstan la sun 'byin pa/ /dur smrig gi ni gos bgos shing / /'bras bu yod dang med smra ba/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus na 'byung / /dngos po med de rkyen rnams kyis/ /yod
287a4(mdo sde): pa 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/ /brtags pa'i dngos po shin tu med/ /rtog go pa rnams rtog par byed/ /ma 'ongs pa yi dus na ni/ /byis pa'i rang bzhin gzeg zan 'byung //
287a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu med smra'i lta ngan pas/ /skye bo mang po rlag par byed/ /rdul phran las ni 'gro ba 'byung / /rdul phran rnams ni rgyu med de/ /rdzas dgu rnams kyang rtag pa'o zhes/ /lta ba
287a6(mdo sde): ngan pas ston par 'gyur/ /rdzas rnams kyis ni rdzas brtsams te/ /yon tan gyis kyang yon tan no/ /dngos po dag gi dngos nyid gzhan/ /yod pa dag ni 'jig par byed/ /
287a7(mdo sde): gal te ma byung 'byung 'gyur na/ /'jig rten thog ma yod par 'gyur/ /'khor ba sngon gyi mtha' ma ni/ /ngas ni med par bshad pa yin/ /srid gsum thams cad bgrang ba dag
287b1(mdo sde): de ste ma byung 'byung na ni/ /khyi dang rnga mo bong bu la'ang / /ra skyer 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /gal te gzugs dang rnam shes dang / /mig ni ma skyes skye 'gyur na/ /cod pan re lde ras la
287b2(mdo sde): sogs/ /'jim pa bsgongs las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ras la re lde yod pa min/ /rtsi kyang la yang ras med do/ /gcig po las ni gcig 'byung na/ /rkyen rnams kyis kyang cir mi
287b3(mdo sde): 'byung / /'tshol de dang lus de dang / /gang yang ma byung skye ba ni/ /de dag thams cad gzhan smra ba/ /ngas kyang de dag shin tu bshad/ /snga ma'i phyogs ni brjod bya ste/ /de dag blo ni
287b4(mdo sde): bzlog par bya/ /de dag blo ni bzlog byas nas/ /bdag gi phyogs ni ngas bshad do/ /nga yi slob ma rmongs pa'i sde/ /yod med phyogs la gnas 'ong zhes/ /de phyir mu stegs smra ba
287b5(mdo sde): dag |ngas ni brjod par byas pa yin/ /yan lag ser skya blo ngan pa'ang / /'gro ba gtso las skyes pa dang / /yon tan rnam par 'gyur ba yang / /slob ma rnams la rab tu ston/ /
287b6(mdo sde): rkyen gyis byung dang ma byung min/ /rkyen rnams yod pa ma yin te/ /rkyen rnams dngos po med pa'i phyir/ /ma byung ba ni mi 'byung ngo / /yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral zhing / /rgyu dang rkyen
287b7(mdo sde): rnams spangs pa dang / /skye dang 'jig pa med pa dang / /rang gi phyogs te mtshan gzhi spangs/ /sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba yi/ /'jig rten rgyu dang rkyen spangs pa/ /rtag tu rgyu med par mthong
288a1(mdo sde): na| |rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go / dri za'i grong khyer smig rgyu 'dra/ /rtag par skra shad 'dzings pa bzhin/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral zhing / /rgyu
288a2(mdo sde): dang rkyen gyis spangs pa yi/ /srid pa rgyu med par mthong na/ /sems kyi rgyu ni rnam par 'dag /gang gi dngos po med pa dang / /sems tsam pa yang med 'gyur na/ /dngos po med par
288a3(mdo sde): ji ltar sems/ /sems tsam du yang mi rung ngo / /dngos po la ni dmigs byas shing / /mi rnams sems kyang skye bar 'gyur/ /sgyu med par ni ji ltar sems/ /sems tsam du
288a4(mdo sde): ni mi rung ngo / /'phags pa'i dngos po'i tshul la ni/ /de bzhin nyid dang sems tsam yod/ /yod pa'ang min pa de dag ni/ /nga yi tshul la mi mkhas pa'o/ /gzung dang 'dzin
288a5(mdo sde): pa'i dngos bor ni/ /gal te sems ni 'jug 'gyur na/ /de ni 'jig rten pa yi sems/ /sems tsam du yang mi rung ngo / /lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra dang / /gal te
288a6(mdo sde): rmi lam 'dra skye na/ /sems ni rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /sems la gnyis kyi mtshan nyid med/ /ji ltar ral gri rang so dang / /ji ltar mdzub mo rang rtse la/ /mi gcod reg
288a7(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin sems kyis rang blta la'o/ /gzhan dag med cing dbang yang med/ /brtags pa yi ni dngos po med/ /chos lnga rnams dang sems gnyis kyang /
288b1(mdo sde): snang ba med la med pa'o/ /skye bar bya dang skye byed dang / /dngos po'i mtshan nyid rnam gnyis te/ /skye bar byed las dgongs byas nas/ /rang bzhin med par ngas bshad do/ /rnam
288b2(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs don dbyibs su/ /gal te rnam par rtog skye na/ /ri bong rwa dang nam mkha' yang / /don du snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te ma brtags don yod na/ /sems kyang
288b3(mdo sde): don du snang bar 'gyur/ /sems dang tha dad brtags pa yi/ /don ni shin tu mi dmigs so/ /thog ma med ldan 'khor pa na/ /don ni gang na'ang med pa ste/ /sems ni rgyas par
288b4(mdo sde): ma gyur na/ /ji ltar don du snang bar 'jug /gal te med pas rgyas 'gyur na/ /ri bong rwa yang der 'gyur ro/ /dngos po med pas rgyas gyur pa'i/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung
288b5(mdo sde): ngo| |ji ltar da ltar med pa bzhin/ /sngon kyang de ni yod pa min/ /don med par ni don 'brel sems/ /ji lta bur na 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mtha'//
288b6(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa ni/ /don dam gyi ni rang bzhin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen la rtog pa yis/ /srid pa rgyu med ma byung bar/ /rab tu shes par
288b7(mdo sde): ma gyur pas/ /byis pa yod dang med par lhung / /snang ba med par sems mngon te/ /bye brag thog ma med rgyus 'byung / /thog ma med nas don med na/ /bye brag ci yis skye bar
289a1(mdo sde): 'gyur| |gal te med pas rgyas 'gyur na/ /dbul po dag kyang nor ldan 'gyur/ /don med ji ltar sems skye ba/ /thub pas bdag la bshad
289a2(mdo sde): du gsol/ /'di dag thams cad rgyu med de/ /sems kyang med cing spyod yul med/ /sems kyang rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ /srid pa gsum ni byed spangs pa'o/ /skye ba rnam
289a3(mdo sde): bar bzlog pa'i phyir/ /mi skye ba ni rab tu bsgrub/ /rgyu med smra bar bshad pa ni/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rig go /'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa/ /dngos po med pa'ang
289a4(mdo sde): ma yin te/ /rmi lam sgyu 'dra dri za'i grong / /rgyu med pa yi dngos po yod/ /ma skyes rang bzhin med pa dang / /ci phyir stong pa'ang bdag la gsungs/ /'dus pa dag ni ma gtogs
289a5(mdo sde): par| |nam zhig dngos po mi snang ba/ /de tshe ma skyes stong pa ste/ /rang bzhin med par ngas bshad do/ /rmi lam skra shad sgyu ma dang / /dri za'i grong khyer smig sgyu rnams/ /rgyu
289a6(mdo sde): med par yang snang gyur pa/ /'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin no/ /de bzhin 'dus pa re rer yang / /snang ba med pas yod ma yin/ /'dus pa mu stegs lta ba ltar/ /'jig
289a7(mdo sde): pas rnam par 'gyur ba min/ /rgyu med smra bas brtsad bya ste/ /ma skyes pa yang rab tu bsgrub/ /skye ba med pa rab bsgrubs na/ /nga yi tshul ni mi 'jig go /rgyu med smra ba bstan
289b1(mdo sde): na ni| |ji ltar ci las ci dag gis/ /gang du rgyu med skyer 'gyur zhes/ /mu stegs can rnams 'jigs pa skye/ /rgyu las ma yin rgyu med par/ /nam zhig 'dus byas mthong ba na/ /
289b2(mdo sde): de yi skye 'jig smra ba yi/ /lta ba rnam par ldog par 'gyur/ /dngos po med pa skye med dam/ /de ste rkyen la brtags pa'am/ /'on te dngos po'i ming lags sam/ /don med pa
289b3(mdo sde): yang bdag la gsungs/ /dngos med mi skye ma yin te/ /rkyen la brtags pa'ang ma yin no/ /dngos po'i ming yang de min te/ /don med pa'ang ming ma yin/ /nyan thos dang ni rang
289b4(mdo sde): rgyal dang / /sa bdun du ni phyin rnams dang / /mu stegs spyod yul ma yin pa/ /de ni mi skye mtshan nyid do/ /rgyu dang rkyen rnams bzlog pa dang / /byed pa dag ni dgag pa dang / /
289b5(mdo sde): sems tsam du ni rnam gzhag pa/ /skye ba med par ngas bshad do/ /dngos po rgyu las 'byung med pa/ /rtog dang rtag pa spangs pa ste/ /yod med phyogs las grol ba ni/ /skye ba med
289b6(mdo sde): par ngas bshad do/ /sems ni snang dang rnam bral ba/ /rang bzhin gnyis kyang spangs pa ste/ /gnas rnams rab tu gyur pa ni/ /skye ba med par ngas bshad do/ /phyi rol dngos po
289b7(mdo sde): dngos med min/ /sems kyang yongs su gzung ba med/ /lta ba thams cad rab spangs pa/ /de ni skye med mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin stong pa rang bzhin med/ /de la sogs pa'i tshig
290a1(mdo sde): kun brtag / nam yang stong las stong ma yin/ /skye ba med pa'i stong pa'o/ /rkyen gyi rnam pa 'dus pa las/ /rab tu 'jug cing ldog par 'gyur/ /
290a2(mdo sde): 'dus pa las ni logs shig na/ /skyes pa med cing 'gags pa'ang med/ /gcig pa dang ni tha dad du/ /ji ltar mu stegs can rtog bzhin/ /dngos po tha dad ma yin dang / /
290a3(mdo sde): 'dus las gud na gang na'ang med/ /yod med dngos po mi skye ste/ /med min yod min gang na'ang med/ /de phyir gzhan du 'dus pa ni/ /rab tu 'jug cing ldog par 'gyur//
290a4(mdo sde): 'di ni brda tsam nyid yin te/ /phan tshun ltos pa 'brel ba yin/ /rkyen rnams 'brel las logs shig na/ /bskyed par bya ba'i don med do/ /bskyed pa med pas skye ba
290a5(mdo sde): med| |mu stegs can gyi skyon gyis spangs/ /'brel pa tsam du ngas bshad de/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi rig go /gang na 'brel las logs shig na/ /dngos po bskyed pa yod
290a6(mdo sde): ces pa/ /'brel pa rnam par 'jig pa ste/ /rgyu med smra bar shes par bya/ /gang na 'brel las logs shig na/ /dngos po su la yod na ni/ /mar me bzhin du rdzas rigs rnams//
290a7(mdo sde): 'brel pa snang ba'i byed par 'gyur/ /'brel pa dag las logs shig tu/ /chos gang mi mkhas rtog pa ni/ /ma skyes ngo bo nyid med de/ /rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /
290b1(mdo sde): 'phags pas thob pa'i chos nyid ni/ /skye ba med pa gzhan yin te/ /gang de'i skye ba med pa ni/ /de ni mi skye bzod pa yin/ /nam zhig 'jig rten 'di dag kun/ /'di ni 'brel ba
290b2(mdo sde): tsam mo zhes/ /'brel pa nyid du mthong ba na/ /de na sems kyang mnyam par 'jog /mi shes sred pa las la sogs/ /'brel pa dag gi nang gi yin/ /'khor lo 'jim shing srub
290b3(mdo sde): la sogs/ /sa bon 'byung sogs phyi rol lo/ /'di ni 'brel pa tsam yin te/ /gang gi dngos po rkyen gzhan las/ /gang yang skye bar 'dod pa ni/ /'thad dang lung la de mi gnas//
290b4(mdo sde): gal te bskyed bya'i dngos med na/ /blo yang gang gi rkyen las byung / /'di dag phan tshun rkyen gyur pas/ /de phyir de dag rkyen du shes/ /drod gsher sra dang g.yo ba yi/ /chos rnams
290b5(mdo sde): byis pas rnam brtags te/ /'di ni 'dus pa chos ma yin/ /de phyir ngo bo nyid med do/ /nad pa'i dbang du sman pa dang / /bya ba tha dad ston mod kyi/ /de la gtsug lag tha dad med//
290b6(mdo sde): nad kyis phye bas tha dad do/ /de bzhin ngas kyang sems can rgyud/ /nyon mongs nyes pa'i skyon chags pa/ /dbang po dag gi stobs shes nas/ /byis pa dag la tshul bshad do/ /nyon
290b7(mdo sde): mongs dbang po tha dad pas/ /nga yi bstan pa dbyer mi phyed/ /yan lag brgyad ldan zhi ba yi/ /lam ni theg pa gcig yin no/ /rdza dang snam bu cod pan rwa/ /ri bong rwa ni med pa'i
291a1(mdo sde): rgyu| |gang rgyu tshogs las byung ba de/ /khyod kyis med par shes mi bya/ /yod pa'i rgyus ni med pa ste/ /med pa med par mi rung ngo / /yod pa med pa'i
291a2(mdo sde): zla las byung / /phan tshun zla yi rgyu yin no/ /ci zhig la ni gnas bcas shing / /ci zhig snang bar sus bsams pa/ /gang la rten pa ci zhig ni/ /rgyu med pa ste rgyu med min/ /
291a3(mdo sde): gal te gzhan la de rten cing / /de yang gzhan la snang gyur na/ /thug pa med par rab 'gyur te/ /ci zhig ci yang med par 'gyur/ /ji ltar lo ma shing sogs la/ /rten cing
291a4(mdo sde): sgyu ma snang ba ltar/ /de bzhin dngos la brten byas shing / /mi rnams la ni sna tshogs snang / /sgyu ma'i dra ba lo ma min/ /gyo mo ma yin shing ma yin/ /byis pa rnams kyis sgyu
291a5(mdo sde): par mthong / /sgyu ma byed pas gnas mthong ngo / /de bzhin dngos la brten bcas te/ /ci zhig bye brag tu 'gyur na/ /snang ba'i tshe na gnyis med par/ /ci zhig tu ni ji ltar
291a6(mdo sde): brtag / rnam par rtog la rnam brtags med/ /rnam par rtog pa'ang med pa ste/ /rnam par rtog la med pas na/ /mya ngan 'das med 'khor ba med/ /rnam par rtog pa med
291a7(mdo sde): pas na/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go /ma zhugs na ni ji ltar sems/ /sems tsam du ni mi rung ngo / /bsam pa du ma tha dad phyir/ /bstan pa la ni snying po med/ /snying po
291b1(mdo sde): med phyir thar pa med/ /'jig rten rnam pa sna tshogs med/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa yi/ /phyi rol gyi ni snang ba med/ /sems ni gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang / /bag chags kyis
291b2(mdo sde): ni mgo yung bslang / /yod med ma byung med pas na/ /dngos po thams cad ma skyes te/ /'di dag thams cad sems tsam mo/ /rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs/ /byis pa rkyen gyis
291b3(mdo sde): dngos por 'chad/ /mkhas pa dag ni ma yin no/ /rang bzhin sems dang bral ba ste/ /sems ni 'phags par nyer 'gro zhi/ /grangs can gcer bu khyad par can/ /de bzhin
291b4(mdo sde): bram ze phyugs bdag rnams/ /yod dang med pa'i lta bar lhung / /rnam par dben pa'i don gyis spangs/ /rang bzhin med dang ma skyes dang / /stong pa sgyu ma dri med rnams/ /sangs
291b5(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang khyod kyis kyang / /su yi phyir ni de dag bshad/ /rnal 'byor can ni sems gtsang la/ /lta ba rtog ge rnam spangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnal 'byor bshad/ /
291b6(mdo sde): ngas kyang rab tu bshad pa yin/ /gal te 'di kun sems yin na/ /'jig rten ci la rab tu gnas/ /ci phyir mi rnams 'ong 'gro bar/ /sa la rab tu snang bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar
291b7(mdo sde): bya rnams nam mkha' la/ /rtog pas kun tu bskyod pas na/ /gnas med rten pa med bzhin du/ /sa yi steng bzhin de dag spyod/ /de bzhin lus can thams cad kyang / /rnam par
292a1(mdo sde): rtog pas bskyod pas na/ /de dag bdag gi sems la rgyu/ /nam mkha' la ni bya bzhin no/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas snang ba'i/ /sems ni rab tu 'jug
292a2(mdo sde): bshad pa/ /snang dang 'jug pa ji ltar cis/ /sems tsam po ni bdag la gsungs/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas rnams dang / /snang dang 'jug pa bag chags dang / /snang dang
292a3(mdo sde): 'jug par rnam rtog pas/ /mi brtson rnams la skye bar 'gyur/ /dngos po rnam par brtags pa yul/ /sems ni yul las byung ba ste/ /snang ba'i sems ni yongs shes pas/ /
292a4(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go /brtags pa'i ring ni ming bral dang / /blo dang rig bya spangs par ni/ /'dus byas nam zhig mthong gyur pa/ /de yi tshe na grol bar 'gyur/ /ming
292a5(mdo sde): la ming ni rnam sgom par/ /shes par bya ba de tsam ste/ /gang dag gzhan du shes byed pa/ /de dag mi shes shes byed min/ /chos lnga rnams dang rang bzhin dang / /rnam par shes
292a6(mdo sde): pa brgyad rnams dang / /bdag med gnyis kyi nang du ni/ /theg pa chen po thams cad 'dus/ /gang gi tshe na 'gro ba dag /blo dang rig byas dben mthong ba/ /de tshe ming la ming
292a7(mdo sde): rtog pa/ /mngon par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems mthong phyir ni bya ba dang / /yi ge rtog pa phyir rtog go /rang gi sems ni ma mthong phyir/ /rnam par rtog pa rab tu
292b1(mdo sde): 'jug / gzugs med pa yi phung po bzhin/ /de dag las ni bgrang ba med/ /'byung ba tha dad mtshan gyis gzugs/ /ji ltar gzugs rnams mang por 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid yongs
292b2(mdo sde): su btang ba'i phyir/ /'byung las gyur min 'byung ba min/ /'on te mtshan nyid gzhan gzugs na/ /phung po rnams kyis cir mi skye/ /phung po skye mched rnam grol ba/ /gang tshe mtshan
292b3(mdo sde): nyid med mthong zhing / /chos la bdag med mthong ba'i phyir/ /de tshe sems ni ldog par 'gyur/ /yul dang dbang po tha dad phyir/ /rnam par shes pa brgyad du skye/ /mtshan nyid kyis
292b4(mdo sde): ni gsum yin te/ /snang ba med la ldog par 'gyur/ /kun gzhi yid kyi bdag yin te/ /shes pa nyid ni bdag gi yin/ /gnyis su 'dzin pas rab tu 'jug /yongs su rtog na
292b5(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur/ /gcig dang tha dad rnam grol zhing / /rgyu ba med par nam mthong ba/ /de tshe bdag dang bdag gir yang / /gnyis su rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma zhugs par ni
292b6(mdo sde): rgyas mi 'gyur/ /rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yang min/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu spangs pa yi/ /'gags pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /ci yi phyir na 'jig rten rnams/ /rnam rtog sems
292b7(mdo sde): tsam bdag la gsungs/ /rgyu dang rnam par grol ba yi/ /mtshan dang mtshan gzhi rnam spangs pa/ /rang gi sems ni sna tshogs snang / /mthong ba lta bur rnam par brtags/ /
293a1(mdo sde): sems kyi snang ba shes pa dang / /sems kyi don gzhan gzung ba'i phyir/ /blo yis gang tshe ma mthong na/ /med pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ni/ /sems
293a2(mdo sde): su 'dzin par gyur pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar de yi yod mi 'byung / /rnam rtog dngos min dngos med min/ /de phyir yod pa mi skye ste/ /sems snang yongs su shes pa'i phyir/ /rnam
293a3(mdo sde): rtog 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug pa/ /rab tu gyur pa gnas med pa'o/ /bzhi yi phyogs rnams phyir bzlog cing / /gal te dngos po rgyu can na/ /
293a4(mdo sde): ming gi bye brag gzhan de byas/ /de ni bsgrub pa ma yin no/ /rgyu dang rkyen rnams 'dus pa dang / /rgyu ni bkag par gyur pa'i phyir/ /de dag don gyis dpog par 'gyur/ /yang
293a5(mdo sde): na rgyu las byung bar 'gyur/ /gal te rkyen rnams mi rtag na/ /rtag pa'i nyes pa bzlog par 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams ni mi rtag phyir/ /'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med/ /
293a6(mdo sde): gang yang 'jig par 'gyur bzhin du/ /rgyur gyur pa ni mi snang ngo / /mi mthong ba ni ji ltar cis/ /mi rtag pa las srid mi 'byung / /bsdu ba dag gis sems can gdul/ /tshul
293a7(mdo sde): khrims kyis ni dbang du bya/ /shes rab dag gis lta ba gzhig /rnam par thar pas shin tu spel/ /'di kun 'jig rten rgyang pan te/ /mu stegs can gyis gang bshad rdzun/ /
293b1(mdo sde): rgyu dang 'bras bu yod lta bas/ /rang gi grub pa'i mtha' yang med/ /nga 'dra gcig pu rang grub mtha'/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par spangs/ /'jig rten rgyang pan rnam bral ba/ /slob
293b2(mdo sde): ma'i sde la bshad par bya/ /sems tsam ste ni snang ba med/ /rtag dang chad pa spangs pa yi/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ru/ /sems ni rtag pa gnyis su snang / /ji srid
293b3(mdo sde): sems ni 'jug pa'i bar/ /de srid 'jig rten rgyang pan yin/ /'jig rten rang gi sems mthong na/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go /'du ba 'bras bu don grub pa/ /zad pa
293b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu ma mthong ba/ /'du dang zad pa yongs shes na/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug go /rtag dang mi rtag byas pa dang / /ma byas pa dang gzhan min gzhan/ /de la sogs pa
293b5(mdo sde): thams cad ni/ /'jig rten rgyang pan tshun yin no/ /lha dang lha ma yin dang mi/ /byol song yi dwags gshin rje'i gnas/ /gang du lus can skye ba yi/ /'gro ba rnam pa drug tu
293b6(mdo sde): bshad/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i las rnams kyis/ /de dag tu ni skye bar 'gyur/ /dge ba thams cad bsrungs na ni/ /khyad par du yang thar par 'gyur/ /khyod kyis dge slong sde
293b7(mdo sde): rnams la/ /skad cig skad cig dag la yang / /skye dang skye dang 'chi bshad pa/ /dgongs pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /ji ltar gzugs las gzugs gzhan bzhin/ /sems
294a1(mdo sde): kyang 'dus nas 'jig par 'gyur/ /de'i phyir slob ma rnams la ni/ /skad cig gcig nas gcig skye bshad/ /gzugs dang gzugs la rnam rtog
294a2(mdo sde): pa| |'byung dang 'jig pa de bzhin no/ /rnam par rtog pa skye ba yin/ /rnam par rtog pa gzhan med do/ /skad cig skad cig gang ngas bshad/ /'di ni rkyen du bshad pa yin/
294a3(mdo sde): gzugs su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa/ /skye ba med cing 'jig pa med/ /rkyen dang rkyen las skyes pa rnams/ /ma rig de bzhin nyid la sogs/ /chos gnyis kyis ni 'jug par
294a4(mdo sde): 'gyur| / mi gnyis de bzhin yid gnyis so/ /rkyen dang rkyen las skyes pa yi/ /chos rnams gal te khyad med na/ /rtag la sogs pa 'bras bur 'gyur/ /rkyen rnams kyang ni
294a5(mdo sde): rgyur 'gyur ro/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu gzung ba'i phyir/ /khyod dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung / /mu stegs can dang khyad med 'gyur/ /de phyir thub chen 'phags ma yin/ /
294a6(mdo sde): 'dom gang tsam gyi lus la ni/ /'jig rten kun 'byung 'jig rten dang / /'gog par 'gro ba'i lam gyi rnams/ /rgyal sras rnams la rab tu bshad/ /rang bzhin gsum la
294a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yis/ /so so'i skye bo'i gzung 'dzin ltar/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /chos rnams rnam par rtog par byed/ /de phyir sngon la blta bya ste/ /rang bzhin
294b1(mdo sde): rnams ni smos par bya/ /lta ba rnams ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /rang bzhin rnam par mi brtag go /nyams pa'i nyes phyir sdom pa med/ /sems kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyis
294b2(mdo sde): su 'dzin phyir 'jug par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyid ni gnyis med yin/ /mi shes pa dang sred pa las/ /rnam shes la sogs tshul ma skyes/ /mthar thug med dang byas pa dang /
294b3(mdo sde): srid pa byas las mi skye'o/ /dngos po rnams kyi 'jig pa ni/ /mi mkhas rnams kyis rnam bzhir bshad/ /rnam par rtog pa gnyis 'jug phyir/ /dngos po yod dang dngos med
294b4(mdo sde): med| |mtha' bzhi dag las grol ba yi/ /lta ba gnyis po rnam spangs pa/ /mthong nas rnam rtog gnyis 'jug ni/ /mngon par 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /ma skyes pa yi dngos po
294b5(mdo sde): rnams/ /blo ni rnam par ldang ba'i phyir/ /skyes pa'i dngos po dag la yang / /de dang 'dra phyir mi brtag go /ji ltar bdag dang gzhan rnams ni/ /rtag tu yod med ma 'dres
294b6(mdo sde): par| |lta ba rnam gnyis bzlog pa yi/ /rigs pa mgon po bdag la gsungs/ /mu stegs smra dang ma 'dres shing / /rang rgyal nyan thos rnams spangs pa/ /rgyal sras rnams ni mi
294b7(mdo sde): 'jig phyir/ /rgyal bas mngon rtogs spyod pa dag /rnam thar rgyu dang rgyu med kyang / /skye ba med par mtshan nyid gcig /rnam grangs gzhan gyis de dag slu/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis
295a1(mdo sde): rtag tu spang / /sprin dang sprin gyi phung po 'ja' 'dra ba/ /smig rgyu skra shad 'dzings pa sgyu ma 'gro/ /dngos po thams cad rang gi rtog byung ba/ /mu
295a2(mdo sde): stegs 'gro ba rang gi rgyu yis rtog / skye ba med dang de bzhin te/ /yang dag mtha' dang stong pa nyid/ /de dag gzugs kyi ming yin te/ /dngos po med par mi rtog go/
295a3(mdo sde): lag dang byed pa 'jig rten no/ /dbang po brgya byin grong 'jig ltar/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin brtag par mi bya'o/ /gzugs las stong pa
295a4(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin/ /mi skye ba yang de bzhin te/ /gzhan ma yin phyir mi brtag go /lta ba'i nyes par rab tu 'gyur/ /dngos po'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir/ /kun rtog
295a5(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa'o/ /yongs su rtog pa bzung bas na/ /ring thung zlum la sogs pa'o/ /sems ni kun tu rtog pa yin/ /yid ni yongs su rtog pa ste/ /yid kyi rnam shes
295a6(mdo sde): rnam rtog ni/ /mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi spangs pa/ /gang yang mu stegs mi skye dang / /gang yang nga yi tshul blta bas/ /rtog pa de ni khyad par med/ /lta ba'i nyes par rab tu
295a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /dgongs dang skye ba med pa dang / /skye ba med pa'i don nyid de/ /rigs pa shes pa sus shes pa/ /de dag nga yi tshul shes so/ /dgos pa lta ba dgongs pa dang //
295b1(mdo sde): mi skye ba ni gnas med pa/ /don gnyis yongs su shes pa ni/ /skye ba med par ngas bshad do/ /dngos po ma skye rnams mchis sam/ /'on tam legs pas grub chen gsungs/ /
295b2(mdo sde): rgyu med smra dang mi mnyam dang / /med dang chos rnams 'dres par 'gyur/ /rgyu med smra dang mi skye dang / /mi mnyam mu stegs lta ba ste/ /yod dang med las rnam grol bas/ /
295b3(mdo sde): sems tsam du ni ngas bshad do/ /lta ba'i rgyu las byung ba yi/ /skye dang mi skye spang bar byos/ /rgyu med smra bas mi skye dang / /skye ba'i rgyu yi gnas su 'gyur/ /lhun gyis grub la
295b4(mdo sde): bya ba med/ /gal te bya yod lta 'dres 'gyur/ /thabs dang smon lam la sogs pas/ /lta ba nyid ni bdag la gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad med pa'i phyir/ /ji lta bu na
295b5(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor skye/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang bral ba'i phyir/ /'jug pa med cing ldog pa med/ /dngos po las ni dngos gzhan mthong / /sems kyang de las byung ba ste/ /chos
295b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni skye med pa/ /de ni ji ltar bdag la gsungs/ /gal te sems tsam yi shes na/ /de yi phyir ni de bshad do/ /thub chen bshad pa thams cad la/ /snga ma dang ni
295b7(mdo sde): phyi mar 'gal/ /mu stegs lta bas rnam grol ba/ /mi mnyam rgyu med spangs pa yi/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa rnams/ /smra ba'i mchog gis bdag la gsungs/ /yod dang med
296a1(mdo sde): las rnam grol zhing / /rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'jig pa'i/ /sa yi rim pa'i mtshams sbyor ba/ /pad+mo'i spyan gyis bdag la gsungs/ /'jig
296a2(mdo sde): rten mtha' gnyis lhung ba ni/ /lta bas rnam par dkrugs gyur pas/ /skye dang mi skye la sogs phyir/ /zhi ba yi ni rgyu mi rtogs/ /nga la dkyil 'khor gang yang med/ /nga ni
296a3(mdo sde): chos nyid mi 'chad de/ /gnyis yod na ni nyes par 'gyur/ /gnyis ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis sbyangs/ /stong pa skad cig dngos po rnams/ /rang bzhin med cing skye med
296a4(mdo sde): pa| |lta ngan smra bas g.yogs pa rtog / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis min/ /ji ltar rnam pa gang dag gis/ /yul la mngon sum 'gyur ba dang / /rnam par rtog
296a5(mdo sde): pa rab 'jug dang / /ldog pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ /kha dog rgyas dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /spros pa rnams kyis bsdus pa'i gzugs/ /mthong nas phyi rol dag tu
296a6(mdo sde): yang / /rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug /de nyid yongs su shes pa dang / /yang dag ji bzhin don mthong phyir/ /'phags pa'i rigs dang mthun pa yi/ /sems ni
296a7(mdo sde): mngon par mi 'jug go / 'byung ba rnams ni ma gtogs par/ /dngos po skye ba med pa ste/ /rtag par 'byung ba 'dra ba'i sems/ /ma skyes par ni rnam par bsgom/ /rnam
296b1(mdo sde): par rtog la ma rtog cig / rnam par rtog med mkhas pa'o/ /rnam par rtog la brtags gyur na/ /gnyis min mya ngan 'das ma yin/ /mi skye bar ni dam bcas pa'i/ /tshul ni sgyu ma bzhin
296b2(mdo sde): du snang / /sgyu ma rgyu med byung ba ste/ /grub mtha' 'das shing nyams par 'gyur/ /thog ma med nas bsgoms pa yi/ /sems ni gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang / /don lta bu ste don
296b3(mdo sde): med min/ /yang dag ji bzhin rnam par bsgom/ /me long la ni ji ltar gzugs/ /gcig dang tha dad nyid spangs pa/ /snang ste de ni med pa'ang min/ /skye ba'i mtshan nyid de bzhin
296b4(mdo sde): no| |dri za sgyu ma la sogs dag / rgyu dang rkyen la ltos pa ltar/ /de bzhin dngos po thams cad kyi/ /'byung ba yin te mi 'byung med/ /bdag dang chos su brtags pa yis/ /rnam
296b5(mdo sde): par rtog pa skyes bu ltar/ /'jug pa rnam pa gnyis kyis 'jug /byis pa rnams kyis mi rtogs so/ /ma tshang ba dang rkyen gyi dbang / /de bzhin nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ /bdag
296b6(mdo sde): mthu rag las rgyal ba mang / /reg lus nyan thos lnga por bshad/ /dus gzhan du ni zhig pa dang / /don dam du dang phan tshun dang / /mi rtag pa ni rnam pa bzhi/ /byis pa mi mkhas
296b7(mdo sde): rtog par byed/ /yon tan rdul phran rang bzhin rgyus/ /byis pa mtha' gnyis lhung ba dag /yod dang med pa'i phyogs 'dzin phyir/ /thar ba yi ni thabs mi shes/ /ji ltar byis pa sor
297a1(mdo sde): mo'i rtser/ /zla bar 'dzin te gzhan du min/ /ji ltar yi ger chags pa'i rnams/ /nga yi de bzhin nyid mi rtogs/ /'byung ba mtshan nyid mi mthun pa//
297a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyi dngos po bskyed pa ste/ /de ni 'byung ba gnas pa yin/ /'byung 'gyur 'byung bas ma byas so/ /me ni gzugs la sreg par byed/ /sprul pa'i rang bzhin chu yi khams//
297a3(mdo sde): rlung ni gzugs la 'dor byed pa/ /'byung bas ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /rnam par shes dang gzugs phung po/ /de ni gnyis te lnga ma yin/ /phung po'i rnam grangs tha dad pa/ /
297a4(mdo sde): ngas ni rnam pa brgyar yang bshad/ /sems dang sems byung bye brag ni/ /'jug pa rab tu 'jug pa yin/ /gzugs kyi rnam par 'dres pa ste/ /'byung las gyur min sems
297a5(mdo sde): gzugs so/ /sngo la sogs pa zla yis dkar/ /dkar la sogs pa'i zla yis sngo/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu bskyed pa dang / /yod dang med dang stong pa nyid/ /grub byed grub dang
297a6(mdo sde): bsgrub bya dang / /grang dro mtshan dang mtshan gzhi dang / /de la sogs pa thams cad ni/ /rtog ge can gyis ma bsgrubs so/ /sems dang yid dang rnam shes drug /de dag
297a7(mdo sde): bdag dang ldan pa ste/ /gcig dang tha dad bral ba yi/ /kun gzhi de ni rab tu 'jug /grangs can gcer bu khyad par can/ /dbang phyug smras pa'i rtog ge pa/ /yod dang med
297b1(mdo sde): pa'i phyogs su lhung / /dben pa'i don gyis rnam par spangs/ /dbyibs dang byad kyi bye brag dag /'byung las skyes te 'byung ba min/ /mu stegs can ni 'byung 'gyur dang / /'byung ba
297b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang skye bar smra/ /de las gang gzhan mu stegs can/ /rgyu las ma skyes rtog par byed/ /yod med phyogs las rten pa'i rnams/ /rmongs pas khong du mi chud do/ /sems dang
297b3(mdo sde): lhan cig ldan pa ste/ /yid la sogs dang bral ba yin/ /rnam dag mtshan nyid sems can ni/ /ye shes dang ni lhan cig gnas/ /gzugs dang las ni gang yod dang / /phung po yul gyi
297b4(mdo sde): rgyus byung dang / /sems can rnams kyang nyer len med/ /gzugs med pa na mi gnas so/ /sems can med par gyur pa'i phyir/ /sems can smra la bdag med gyur/ /rnam par shes pa'ang mi 'byung phyir//
297b5(mdo sde): bdag med smra ba chad par gyur/ /de yi gnas pa bzhi po rnams/ /gzugs med par ni ji ltar yod/ /phyi nang dngos po med pa'i phyir/ /rnam par shes pa mi 'jug go /srid
297b6(mdo sde): pa bar ma'i phung po rnams/ /rtog ge can rnams 'dod pa ltar/ /de bzhin gzugs med par skyes pa'i/ /srid pa'i gzugs ni med dam ci/ /sems can rnam shes med
297b7(mdo sde): na ni| |nan tan ma byas thar par 'gyur/ /mu stegs smra ba the tshom med/ /rtog ge can gyis mi shes so/ /de na gzugs kyang yod pa ste/ /gzugs med pa la lta ba med/ /de
298a1(mdo sde): med pas na grub mtha' med/ /theg pa med cing 'gro ba med/ /dbang po rnams dang ldan pa yi/ /bag chags las byung rnam shes pa/ /rnam pa

298a3(mdo sde): kyis kyang / /dbang po la sogs skad cig bshad/ /gzugs ni rtog par ma gyur par/ /rnam par shes par ji ltar 'jug /rnam par shes par ma zhugs
298a4(mdo sde): na| |ji ltar 'khor ba skyes par 'gyur/ /skyes ma thag tu 'jug par ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa mi 'chad do/ /dngos po rnams kyi rnam rtog pa/ /'gro bar bar chad
298a5(mdo sde): med par g.yo/ /dbang po rnams dang dbang po'i don/ /mkhas la ma yin blun po la/ /byis pa rnams ni ming gis 'dzin/ /'phags pa ming gis don la
298a6(mdo sde): mkhas/ /drug po la ni nyer len med/ /nyer len bcas pa mi zin to/ /yod pa'i nyes dang rnam bral ba/ /bye brag mi 'byed 'phags pa smra/ /shes pa spangs
298a7(mdo sde): pa'i rtog ge pa/ /rtag dang chad pas 'jigs pa dag /'dus byas 'dus ma byas la bdag /byis pa bye brag mi byed do/ /gcig pa la yang sbyin pa yod/ /tha dad pa
298b1(mdo sde): la'ang yod pa min/ /sems dang lhan cig gcig pa ste/ /yid la sogs dang tha dad do/ /sems dang sems las byung bsgrags pa'i/ /sbyin pa gang tshe nyer len las/ /dbye na
298b2(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na/ /gcig par khong du chud par bya/ /nyer len bcas pa'i dmigs pa ni/ /las dang tshe dang byed sogs pas/ /'dra dang mi 'dra tshul rnams kyis/ /med
298b3(mdo sde): bzhin du ni sgrub par byed/ /ji ltar bsreg bya sreg byed la/ /me ni cig car sreg pa bzhin/ /de bzhin nyer len bcas pa'i bdag /ci phyir rtog ge can mi ston/ /rtag tu
298b4(mdo sde): skyes dang ma skyes kyang / /sems ni shin tu 'od gsal na/ /bdag bsgrubs pa yi dpe dag tu/ /ci phyir rtog ge can mi byed/ /rtog ge can ni tshul spangs pa/ /rnam shes thibs
298b5(mdo sde): por rmongs pa dag / bdag tu smra bar byed 'dod pas/ /phan tshun dag tu rab tu rgyug /so so rang rig rtogs bya ba/ /bdag ni rnam dag mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
298b6(mdo sde): snying po de/ /rtog ge can gyi spyod yul min/ /nyer len nye bar len byed kyi/ /bye brag dang ni phung po yi/ /mtshan nyid gal te shes gyur na/ /tshul gyi ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /mu
298b7(mdo sde): stegs can gyis brjod pa ni/ /kun gzhi snying po lta bu bsam/ /bdag dang lhan cig ldan pa'i chos/ /rab tu brjod pa ma byas so/ /de dag rab tu phye bas na/ /rnam par thar dang
299a1(mdo sde): ba de na mthong na/ /sgom dang mthong bas spang ba yi/ /nyon mongs rnams kyang sbyang ba yi/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal te/ /de bzhin gshegs
299a2(mdo sde): pa'i snying po dag / sems can rnams kyi nyer len ni/ /mtha' dang mtha' med spangs pa'o/ /byi dor byas pas gser mdog dang / /sa le sbram dang khar dag /ji ltar
299a3(mdo sde): mthong ba de bzhin du/ /phung po rnams la sems can no/ /gang zag med cing phung po med/ /sangs rgyas ye shes zag med pa/ /rtag tu zhi ba'i rnams bsgoms te/ /de la

299a5(mdo sde): bstan/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /de las gzhan pa thog ma med/ /de dag gis ni bsags pa'i las/ /des ni de gnyis nyon mongs 'gyur/ /thog ma med
299a6(mdo sde): pa'i glo bur gyi/ /nyon mongs rnams dang ldan pas na/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal bdag nyon mongs/ /ras dang 'dra bar dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar gos sam gser yang rung / /
299a7(mdo sde): dri ma med phyir nyes spangs bzhin/ /gnas shing 'jig par mi 'gyur te/ /nyes med bdag nyid de bzhin no/ /rnga'am dung ngam pi wang la/ /sgra snyan phun sum tshogs pa
299b1(mdo sde): dag |mi mkhas la la tshol bar byed/ /de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/ /sa la gter dang nor bu dang / /de bzhin du ni chu rnams kyang / /yod bzhin du yang mi snang ba/ /de bzhin
299b2(mdo sde): gang zag phung po la'o/ /sems dang sems las byung tshogs dang / /bdag gi yon tan phung po ldan/ /mi mkhas pas ni mi shes te/ /de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/ /ji ltar sprum
299b3(mdo sde): par gyur ba'i bu/ /yod bzhin du yang mi snang ba/ /de bzhin bdag nyid phung po la/ /rig pa mi shes pas mi mthong / /ji ltar sman gyi gsod pa dang / /ji ltar me ni shing rnams
299b4(mdo sde): la| |rigs pa mi shes pas mi mthong / /de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/ /dngos po rnams la mi rtag dang / /stong pa nyid kyang yod bzhin du/ /mi mkhas rnams kyis mi mthong
299b5(mdo sde): ba| |de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/ /sa dang dbang dang mngon shes dang / /bla ma yi ni dbang bskur dang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnams/ /bdag med na ni med pa yin/ /
299b6(mdo sde): gang tshe 'jig byed song nas ni/ /gal te yod na ston ces zer/ /rang gi rnam rtog ston cig ces/ /de la mkhas pas bsgo bar bya/ /sangs rgyas chos la gnod byed pa/ /yod med
299b7(mdo sde): phyogs la lta ba yi/ /bdag med smra dang smra mi bya/ /dge slong las la spang bar bya/ /bdag med nags tshal sreg byed cing / /mu stegs nyes las rnam grol ba/ /dus mtha'i
300a1(mdo sde): me ni 'bar ba bzhin/ /bdag tu smra 'di rab tu 'bar/ /khaN+Da sbrang rtsi kha ra dang / /mar dang til la sogs pa dang / /de dag rang gi ro yod kyang //
300a2(mdo sde): ma myangs bar du rtogs mi 'gyur/ /phung po mthong ba rnams la bdag /rnam pa lngar ni gzung byas kyang / /mi mkhas rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /mkhas pas
300a3(mdo sde): mthong nas rnam par grol/ /rig sngags la sogs dpe rnams kyis/ /sems ni rtogs par mi nus te/ /gang la gang phyir gang don du/ /'dus pa rnams ni mi rtogs
300a4(mdo sde): so| |chos rnams mtshan nyid mi 'dra ste/ /sems gcig po ni mi bzung ngo / /rgyu med pa dang mi 'jug par/ /rtog ge pa la nyes par 'gyur/ /sems kyi rjes lta rnal
300a5(mdo sde): 'byor pa/ /sems rnams kyis ni sems mi mthong / /mthong byed snang las byung ba na/ /snang ba ci yi rgyu las 'byung / /nga ni kAt+yA ya na'i rigs/ /gtsang ma'i gnas nas
300a6(mdo sde): byung ba ste/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'gro ba'i/ /chos ni sems can rnams la ston/ /'di ni sngon gyi lam yin te/ /nga dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /stong phrag
300a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi mdo rnams kyis/ /mya ngan 'das pa shin tu bshad/ /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs med du/ /sangs rgyas rnam par 'tshang mi rgya/ /gzugs kyi
300b1(mdo sde): khams kyi 'og min du/ /'dod chags bral khyod 'tshang rgya'o/ /'chi ba'i rgyu ni yul ma yin/ /rgyu ni yul la 'ching ba ste/ /ye shes kyis ni nyon mongs bsad/ /'di ni
300b2(mdo sde): brtul zhugs ral gri'i so/ /bdag med sgyu ma la sogs pa'i/ /chos rnams ji ltar yod med 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams la yang dag snang / /bdag med nyid ni ji ltar med//
300b3(mdo sde): byas pa dang ni ma byas phyir/ /rgyu ni 'jug par byed pa med/ /'di dag thams cad ma skyes te/ /byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so/ /rgyu yi rnams ni ma skyes te/ /rkyen rnams de dag
300b4(mdo sde): byas pa'o/ /de gnyis bskyed pa ma yin na/ /rgyu rnams kyis ni ji ltar brtag /snga phyi dang ni cig car yang / /rtog ge rnams kyang rgyur ston to/ /snang dang slob ma rdzas sogs
300b5(mdo sde): kyis| |dngos po rnams kyi skye ba 'chad/ /mngon par 'du byed mtshan rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ldan ma yin te/ /de dag 'khor los bsgyur yon tan/ /des ni
300b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mi brjod do/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni ye shes te/ /lta ba'i nyes pas rnam spangs pa/ /so so rang rig lta bas rtogs/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam 'joms
300b7(mdo sde): pa'o| |'o na lkug long ba zhar ba dang / /rgan pa dag ni shar gnyer dang / /byis pa rnams la bye brag tu/ /tshangs par spyod pa med pa'o/ /bsgribs dang gsal dang lha
301a1(mdo sde): yi ni| |mtshan rnams kyis ni 'khor los bsgyur/ /gsal ba la la rab tu 'byung / /gnyis po gzhan ni bag med pa'o/ /rgyas dang gzeg zan
301a2(mdo sde): khyu mchog dang / /ser skya shAkya'i gtso bo rnams/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu/ /de la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mya ngan nga 'das lo brgya na/ /rgyas dang khur 'phel
301a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ /paN Da ba dang ko 'ur ba/ /dga' bo'i 'og tu mo'u ri 'byung / /mo'u R+Ya dga' bo skyabs 'og tu/ /kla klo rgyal po'i tha shal rnams/ /kla klo'i rjes la mtshon
301a4(mdo sde): gyis 'khrug / mtshon gyi rjes la rtsod dus so/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/ /'jig rten dam chos mi sgom mo/ /de la sogs pa 'das pa dag /'gro ba 'khor lo bzhin du
301a5(mdo sde): 'khor/ /me dang nyi mar phrad pa'i phyir/ /'dod pa'i khams ni bsregs nas kyang / /gang la 'jig rten gnas gyur par/ /phyi nas lha rdzas gnas su 'gyur/ /rigs
301a6(mdo sde): bzhi mi mgon dbang po dang / /drang srong rnams dang chos kyang ste/ /rig byed chos sbyin mchod sbyin dang / /chos kyi rnams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gtam dang srung la
301a7(mdo sde): sogs pa dang / /rkyang pa rtogs byed 'grel pa dang / /'di skad bdag gis thos sogs pas/ /'jig rten shin tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /shin tu bcos shing bcag byas
301b1(mdo sde): nas| |steng nas kha dog sbyar bar bya/ /sngo dang lci ba 'dam sogs pas/ /snam bu shin tu bri bar bya/ /lus ni gos rnams kyis bkra ba/ /mu stegs mtshan ma spangs pa yi/ /
301b2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyis bstan pa bshad/ /de ni sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan no/ /tshags kyis btsags pa'i chu yang btung / /rked pa'i srad bu bcing bar bya/ /dus su 'os
301b3(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang / /dma' ba spangs pa'i slong mo zas/ /mtho ris nas ni lha rdzas 'byung / /gnyis po gzhan ni mi las 'byung / /rin chen mtshan rnams phun sum tshogs//
301b4(mdo sde): lhar skyes ba yi 'gro ba'i dbang / /mtho ris phan byed chos ston pa/ /gling bzhi rnams la rab tu spyod/ /shin tu yun ring gling spyad nas/ /sred pas rnam par 'jig par
301b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /byis pa'i dus dang skyabs byung dus/ /gnyis po gzhan dang rtsod pa ste/ /nga dang gzhan ni byas dus la/ /shAkya seng ge rtsod pa'i dus/ /dus grub pa dang shAkya'i
301b6(mdo sde): sras| |'jug sel rgyas dang dbang phyug dang / /de la sogs pa'i mu stegs can/ /mya ngan 'das 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'di skad bdag gis thos la sogs/ /
301b7(mdo sde): shAkya seng ge'i bshad pa yin/ /sgrub dang sngon chad byung ba dag /de dag rgyas pa'i yin par 'gyur/ /'jug sel dang ni dbang phyug kyang / /'byin par byed pa 'chad par 'gyur//
302a1(mdo sde): mya ngan nga 'das phyin chad ni/ /de lta bu la sogs par 'byung / /nga yi ma ni nor ldan te/ /pha ni bram ze skye dgu'i bdag /nga ni kAt+yA ya na'i rigs//
302a2(mdo sde): ming ni rdul med rgyal ba'o/ /yab dang mes dang nga bdag kyang / /yul ni tsam par skyes pa ste/ /mtshan ni zla ba skyabs zhes bya/ /zla ba'i rigs las de skyes so/ /thar par
302a3(mdo sde): zhugs shing brtul zhugs spyad/ /tshul yang rnam pa stong bshad nas/ /blo gros chen po dbang bskur te/ /lung bstan byas nas mya ngan 'da'/ /chos la blo ni sbyin par
302a4(mdo sde): bya| |chos kyis me khal la la sbyin/ /me khal slob ma zhan pas na/ /bskal pa'i mthar ni 'jig par 'gyur/ /'od srung dang ni log dad sel/ /'dren pa gser thub
302a5(mdo sde): rnams dag dang / /rdul med nga dang gzhan dag dang / /de dag thams cad byas dus rgyal/ /de yi 'og tu byas dus la/ /'dren pa blo gros zhes bya ba/ /shes bya lnga rnams ston
302a6(mdo sde): pa'o| |dpa' bo chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gnyis gzhan la min skyob byung min/ /rtsod dus phyi ma'i tshe la yang / /'jig rten mgon po 'byung mi 'gyur/ /byas dus la
302a7(mdo sde): ni rdzogs 'tshang rgya/ /mi phrog pa dang ngo shes bya/ /ma dras kha tshar bcas pa ste/ /rma bya'i mdongs su 'dra ba yis/ /steng yongs ri mo bri bar bya/ /mdongs dang mdongs kyi
302b1(mdo sde): bar du ni/ /sor gnyis sor gsum tshad du bya/ /de las gzhan du bris na ni/ /byis pa rnams kyang chags par 'gyur/ /rtag par 'dod chags me zhi bya/ /ye shes chus ni khrus
302b2(mdo sde): kyang bya/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni nan tan du/ /dus mtshams gsum dang sdom gsum byas/ /mda' dang rdo dang shing la sogs/ /'phen la sogs pas bskyod pa dang / /gcig
302b3(mdo sde): 'phangs na ni gcig lhung 'gyur/ /dge dang mi dge de bzhin no/ /gcig pu mang po ma yin te/ /mi 'dra'i mtshan phyir gang na'ang med/ /len pa kun ni rlung dang 'dra/ /sbyin pa byed
302b4(mdo sde): pa zhing bzhin no/ /gal te gcig po mang 'gyur na/ /thams cad ma byas par 'gyur ro/ /byas na rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /'di ni rtog ge can gyi tshul/ /de ni mar me sa
302b5(mdo sde): bon 'dra/ /'dra phyir mang du ga la 'gyur/ /de lta bur na mang du 'gyur/ /de ni rtog ge pa yi tshul/ /til las bal sran skye mi 'gyur/ /'bras ni nas kyi rgyu las min/ /gro dang
302b6(mdo sde): 'bru yi rnam pa dag / gcig ni ji ltar mang por 'gyur/ /sgra byed pa ni pa Ni ni/ /rkang pa'i mig dang che dbang dang / /tshangs pa dang ni gar ga dang / /'jig rten rgyang pa na byed pa
302b7(mdo sde): 'byung | |kAt+yA ya na mdo byed pa/ /mchod sbyin bal ka de bzhin te/ /b+hu d+hu ka dang skar mkhan dag /rtsod pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams byas pa'i 'jig rten
303a1(mdo sde): gyi| |skye dgu'i dpal gyi stobs can 'byung / /chos kun la ni srung byed pa/ /rgyal po stobs can sa gtong ba'o/ /grog ma'i mkhar dang sran chung
303a2(mdo sde): mig / gya gyu can dang rta 'dzin bu/ /khyu mchog dpal chen rnams dag kyang / /ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /don grub pa dang shAkya'i bu/ /yang dag mtha' dang phung po
303a3(mdo sde): lnga| |tshig stobs can dang yid gzhungs pa/ /phyi ma'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur/ /nags kyi gnas na 'dug pa'i tshe/ /dbyu gu shing dang pags pa dang / /rked chings dang
303a4(mdo sde): ni ril pa rnams/ /nga la tshangs pa sbyin par byed/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa chen po ste/ /thub pa rdul med ces bya ba'i/ /thar pa chad pa'i ston par 'gyur/ /'di ni thub
303a5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa brgya rnams dang / /lha rnams mang por bcas pa yi/ /nga la mkha' las 'phags por nas/ /dbang ldan de nyid mi snang
303a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /dbang po lha dang bcas pa dang / /'phags skyes po la sogs pa yi/ /sna tshogs gos dang slong snod kun/ /nags kyi gnas su nga la 'dul/ /mi skye smra ba'i
303a7(mdo sde): rgyur 'dod pa/ /skyes sam skyes par 'gyur yang rung / /ma skyes pa ni sgrub par 'gyur/ /tshig tsam du ni brjod pa yin/ /sems de 'byung bar byed pa yi/ /rgyu ni ma rig
303b1(mdo sde): de yin te/ /ji srid gzugs dag mi shes pa/ /de srid par du de gnas ci/ /zhig par gyur ma thag tu ni/ /sems ni gzhan rnams rab 'byung ste/ /gzugs na dus su mi gnas
303b2(mdo sde): na| |ci la dmigs te 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang las gang du 'jug pa yi/ /sems ni log pa'i rgyu las byung / /de ni rab tu ma grub na/ /ji ltar skad cig 'jig par rig/
303b3(mdo sde): rnal 'byor can gyi snyoms 'jug dang / /gser dang rgyal ba'i ring srel dang / /'od snang gnas kyi gzhal med khang / /'jig rten rgyu yis 'jig par med/ /gnas pa rnams
303b4(mdo sde): dang thob pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas ye shes phun sum tshogs/ /dge slong nyid dang shes thob rnams/ /skad cig mar ni ji ltar mthong / /sgyu ma dri za'i grong sogs kyi/ /gzugs
303b5(mdo sde): rnams ji ltar skad cig pa/ /'byung ba rnams ni 'byung 'gyur min/ /'gro bar 'byung bcang mi byed/ /sems ni ma rig rgyu las byung / /thog ma med nas bsags pa yin/ /
303b6(mdo sde): skye dang 'jig dang kun 'brel bar/ /rtog ge ba dag rab tu rtog /grangs can smra ba rnam gnyis te/ /gtso bo las ni 'gyur ba dag /gtso bo yod na 'bras bu yod/ /'bras bu
303b7(mdo sde): bdag nyid rab tu sgrub/ /gtso bo dang ni dngos 'jug par/ /yon tan bye brag rab tu bsgrags/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa/ /'gyur ba la ni med pa yin/ /ji ltar dngul
304a1(mdo sde): chu dag pa la/ /dri ma rnams kyis mi chags pa/ /de bzhin lus can thams cad kyi/ /kun gzhi gnas kyang dag pa'o/ /shing kun dri dang sgog pa
304a2(mdo sde): dang | |sbrum ma'i bur ni mthong ba dang / /lan tshwa la sogs ro yod dang / /ci phyir sa bon bzhin mi 'gyur/ /de nyid dang ni tha dad dang / /de bzhin gnyis ka gnyis ma yin/ /
304a3(mdo sde): yod pa yi ni rgyu med de/ /'dus byas la med med pa min/ /bdag ni rta dang 'dra bar yod/ /phung po ba lang ngo bo spangs/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa la/ /smrar med
304a4(mdo sde): brjod med rang bzhin no/ /lung dang rigs pas ngan par mthong / /rtog ge'i lta bas dri mar byas/ /phye ba med par bdag tu smra/ /rgyu med ma yin gzhan na med/ /de dag
304a5(mdo sde): gi ni nyes bsags pa/ /phung po bdag tu mi bsgom ste/ /gcig pa dang ni de las gzhan/ /rtog ge can gyis mi shes so/ /me long chu dang mig rnams la/ /ji ltar gzugs
304a6(mdo sde): brnyan snang 'gyur ba/ /gcig dad tha dad bral ba bzhin/ /de bzhin gang zag phung po la'o/ /bsgom dang rnam bsgom bsam gtan pa/ /lam dang bden dang mthong ba ste/ /
304a7(mdo sde): de rnams gsum ni rnam bsgoms na/ /lta ba ngan las grol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar mthong na zhig pa'i glog /khyim gyi bu ga'i 'khor lo ltar/ /de bzhin chos kun 'gyur
304b1(mdo sde): ba la| |byis pa bzhin du ma rtog cig / dngos po med pas mya ngan 'das/ /byis pa'i sems ni rmongs par byed/ /ji ltar 'dug bzhin mthong ba dang / /'phags pas mthong ba yin
304b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ /skye ba dang ni 'jig bral zhing / /dngos po yod dang med spangs pa/ /mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bral ba yi/ /'gyur ba rnam par bsgom par bya/ /mu stegs can gyi smra
304b3(mdo sde): dang bral/ /ming dang dbyibs ni spangs gyur pa/ /nang gi lta ba'i gnas rnams kyi/ /'gyur ba rnam par bsgom par gyis/ /reg pa dang ni gzir ba yis/ /lha dang sems can
304b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i lus/ /bar ma do yi srid med de/ /rnam par shes pas bskyed pa yin/ /mngal sgo'i drod gsher la sogs pa'i/ /srid pa bar mar 'byung ba dag /sems can mang
304b5(mdo sde): po sna tshogs bzhin/ /'gro dang 'gro bar rnam par bsgoms/ /lung dang rigs par bral gyur pa/ /nyon mongs phyogs dang zad 'thob byed/ /mu stegs lta ba'i smra ba la/ /blo
304b6(mdo sde): gros can gyis mi spyad do/ /thog mar nye bar len pa las/ /bdag ni phye bas bye brag dbye/ /ma phye bye brag 'byed pa ni/ /mo gsham bu la bye brag 'byed/ /'phrul gyis mthong
304b7(mdo sde): ba sems can rnams/ /sha'i dang shes rab rnam par spangs/ /lus can kun gyi gzugs yod pa/ /'du byed phung por spangs gyur pa'o/ /kha dog bzang dang ngan gyur cing / /
305a1(mdo sde): grol dang ma grol khyad gyur pa/ /lha rdzas 'du byed gtogs pa yi/ /'du byed gnas pa rab tu mthong / /'gro ba'i mtshams su gzugs ldan rnams/ /
305a2(mdo sde): rtog ge can gyi spyod yul min/ /mi yi yul las nga 'das te/ /ngan pa'i rtog ge can gzhan min/ /bdag med yid la sems 'byung na/ /ci las de ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
305a3(mdo sde): 'bab chu me mar sa bon bzhin/ /de phyir de yi 'byung mi bshad/ /rnam par shes pa ma skyes la/ /mi shes la sogs med pa ste/ /de med par ni rnam shes pa/ /rgyud kyi
305a4(mdo sde): skye bar ji ltar 'gyur/ /dus gsum dang ni dus med dang / /brjod pa med dang rnam pa lnga/ /de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya bar/ /rtog ge can rnams rab tu brjod/ /shes pa 'du
305a5(mdo sde): byed rgyus 'byung ba/ /'du byed rnams kyis mi brjod de/ /'du byed bsgrubs pa'i shes pa ni/ /'du byed du ni gtogs pa 'dzin/ /'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung ste/ /rkyen
305a6(mdo sde): rnams la ni rgyu med pa/ /gsal bar byed par rab tu ston/ /de med pas na byed pa med/ /rlung ni me dang sprin dag la/ /skyod pa yin te 'byin pa min/ /bskyod nas des
305a7(mdo sde): ni zhir 'gyur na/ /ji ltar sems can rab tu bsgrubs/ /'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa ni/ /nyer len rnam par spangs par brjod/ /me ni de la bsgrubs par yang / /ji ltar
305b1(mdo sde): byis pa rtog par byed/ /phan tshun stobs dang mthu yi phyir/ /mi rnams kyi ni me 'byung na/ /gang phyir mi bzhin brtag bya ba'i/ /sems can gang gis rab tu phyung / /phung po skye
305b2(mdo sde): mched tshogs rnams kyi/ /rgyu ni yid la sogs pa ste/ /bdag med rtag tu mgron mang bzhin/ /sems dang bcas te rab tu 'jug /'di gnyis rtag tu 'od gsal ba/ /rgyu dang
305b3(mdo sde): 'bras bu spangs pa'o/ /de dag sgrub pa me ma yin/ /rtog ge can gyis mi shes so/ /sems dang sems can mya ngan 'das/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal te/ /yid la sogs
305b4(mdo sde): pa'i nyes pa yis/ /nyon mongs mkha' bzhin tha dad min/ /glang po'i mal sogs bzhin sdun yod/ /mu stegs lta bas dri mar byas/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pas g.yogs/ /ma
305b5(mdo sde): la sogs pas rnam par sbyangs/ /de yis yang dag ji bzhin mthong / /mthong nas nyon mongs rnams kyang bshig /thibs po'i dpe rnams rab spangs te/ /de dag 'phags
305b6(mdo sde): pa'i spyod yul dong / /shes dang shes bya'i bye brag gis/ /de gnyis gzhan du mi brtag pa/ /blo ngan rnams kyis mi rtogs te/ /brjod du med par smra bar byed/ /ji ltar tsan+dan
305b7(mdo sde): byas pa'i rnga/ /byis pa dag ni gzhan du byed/ /de bzhin tsan+dan a gar 'dra'i/ /shes pa rtog ge ngan pas so/ /langs nas kha bas phyis mi len/ /lhung bzed gnas dang phyir
306a1(mdo sde): ba can/ /gdong 'gyur la sogs nyes pa rnams/ /dag pas zas la spyad par bya/ /su zhig tshul 'di rigs pas dpog byed pa/ /dad ldan
306a2(mdo sde): rnal 'byor brtson zhing mi rtog pa/ /mi gnas don la rten par gyur pa de/ /chos kyi rnam par gser bzhin spyad par bya/ /blun pas srid dang mi srid rkyen rtog pa/ /de ni lta ngan
306a3(mdo sde): dra ba dri mar bcas/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug bcas pa ldog /chags med sangs rgyas phyag gis dbang bskur 'gyur/ /mu stegs rgyu yi phyogs kyis bslad/ /
306a4(mdo sde): gzhan yang rkyen gyis rnam par rmongs/ /gzhan dag rgyu med de 'byung bas/ /don med pa ni chad pa'o/ /yid dang rnam par shes pa dang / /rnam par smin pa gyur pa ste/ /yid
306a5(mdo sde): ni kun gzhi las byung ba/ /rnam par shes pa yid las byung / /kun gzhi las ni sems kun kyang / /dba' rlabs bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad bag chags
306a6(mdo sde): rgyu las byung / /rkyen bzhin du ni 'byung ba'o/ /skad cig tha dad 'brel bas sbrel/ /rang gi sems ni don la 'dzin/ /dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dag /yid dang mig
306a7(mdo sde): la sogs las byung / /thog ma med nas rnam par 'brel/ /don snang bag chags rnams las byung / /ji ltar snang ba sems snang ste/ /mu stegs lta ba bzlog pa yi/ /de yi
306b1(mdo sde): rgyus byung gzhan nyid kyang / /de la dmigs nas 'jug par 'gyur/ /de las lta ba shes pa dag /'khor bar rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /dngos po rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra/ /dri za'i grong
306b2(mdo sde): khyer rnams bzhin te/ /smig rgyu ba dang chu zla ltar/ /rang gi rnam rtog rnam par bsgoms/ /'jug pa'i rnam pas de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag ye shes de yi gnas/ /sgyu ma dpa'
306b3(mdo sde): bar 'gro la sogs/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gzhan rnams dang / /mngon par shes dang dbang rnams dang / /ye shes sgyu ma lta bu dang / /de bzhin gshegs pas dbang bskur ba/ /
306b4(mdo sde): sa la zhugs nas thob par 'gyur/ /gang tshe 'gro ba rnam rtog mthong / /de tshe sems ni ldog par 'gyur/ /sa ni rab tu dga' ba dang / /sangs rgyas sa dang sa rnams 'thob/ /
306b5(mdo sde): gnas ni rab tu gyur pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar sna tshogs nor bu bzhin/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed de/ /chu la gzugs brnyan ji bzhin no/ /yod dang med pa'i phyogs rnams
306b6(mdo sde): dang | |gnyis dang gnyis med pa dang bral/ /nyan thos rang rgyal 'das gyur na/ /sa bdun par ni 'gyur ba yin/ /so so rang chos mthong bas ni/ /yang dag pa yis
306b7(mdo sde): sbyangs te/ /phyi rol mu stegs rnams spangs pa'i/ /theg pa chen po bshad par bya/ /rnam par rtog par rab gyur na/ /shi 'phos 'jig pa rnams spangs pa/ /ri bong spu yi
307a1(mdo sde): nor bu bzhin/ /grol ba rnams la tshul yang bshad/ /ji ltar tshig la tshig gnas pa/ /gal te rigs la rigs de bzhin/ /de phyir rigs pa'i
307a2(mdo sde): rigs pa yin/ /de las gzhan du ma rtog cig /mig dang las dang sred pa dang / /ma rig de bzhin tshul bzhin min/ /mig dang gzugs dang yid rnams dang / /rnyog pa'i
307a3(mdo sde): yid kyang de bzhin no/ /'phags pa lang+kar gshegs pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo ji snyed pa rdzogs so// //bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa/ 'gos
307a4(mdo sde): chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o/ / //'phags pa lang+kar gshegs pa rin po che'i mdo las/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
307a5(mdo sde): gi snying po zhes bya ba'i le'u/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
307a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i 'gram lang+ka'i ri'i rtse mo rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis bkod pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
307a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
307b1(mdo sde): cad kyang tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtsen pa sha stag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po ni
307b2(mdo sde): gtso bor gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag gis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/ rang gi sems snang ba'i spyod yul gyi don la rab tu mkhas pa/ sems can sna tshogs
307b3(mdo sde): kyis sems dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'dul ba'i sgo tshad med pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu ston pa/ chos lnga dang / rang bzhin dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bdag
307b4(mdo sde): med pa gnyis rtogs par khong du chud pa'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rgyu ba dag
307b5(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas
307b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'jig rten skye 'jig yongs bral te/ /nam mkha'i me tog rab tu 'dra/ /ye shes yod med mi
307b7(mdo sde): dmigs kyang / /thugs rje chen po rab tu skye/ /chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin/ /sems dang rnam shes yongs su spangs/ /ye shes yod med mi dmigs kyang / /thugs
308a1(mdo sde): rje chen po rab tu skye/ /rtag dang chad pa yongs spangs pa/ /'jig rten khor yug rmi lam 'dra/ /ye shes yod med mi dmigs kyang / /thugs rje chen po
308a2(mdo sde): rab tu skye/ /gang zag chos la bdag med dang / /nyon mongs shes bya rab mkhyen cing / /rtag tu dag cing mtshan med kyang / /thugs rje chen po rab tu skye/ /kun las mya ngan
308a3(mdo sde): mi 'da' ste/ /mya ngan 'das sangs rgyas mi dmigs/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' mi dmigs/ /blo dang rig par bgyi dang bral/ /yod pa dang ni med pa'i phyogs/ /gnyis po de
308a4(mdo sde): dag shin tu spangs/ /thub pa zhi ba'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skye ba dag ni rab spangs pas/ /de ni len mi mnga' zhes bgyi/ /'di dang gzhan du rnam par dag /de nas byang chub
308a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas rang gi rigs dang ming brjod de gsol pa/ bdag ming blo gros
308a6(mdo sde): chen po ste/ /theg chen khong du chud par rtogs/ /deng 'dir brgya rtsa brgyad kyi don/ /bla ma'i mchog la zhu bar bgyi/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i skyes mchog gis/ /tshigs
308a7(mdo sde): bcad de ni gsan pa dang / /'khor rnams la ni rnam gzigs nas/ /rgyal sras rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /khyod la sogs pa rgyal sras rnams/ /ci dang ci 'dod dris
308b1(mdo sde): shig dang / /so so rang gi spyod yul ni/ /ngas ni khyad la bshad par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te
308b2(mdo sde): phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba zhus pa/ /ji ltar dran pa rnam dag 'gyur/ /ji ltar dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lta rmongs nor ba ji lta bu/ /nor pa ji ltar
308b3(mdo sde): 'phel bar 'gyur/ /zhing du sprul rnams ci slad du/ /mtshan nyid dang ni mu stegs kyang / /mtshan med rim pa ji lta bu/ /ci slad mtshan ma med pas bgyi/ /ci slad rgyal ba'i sras
308b4(mdo sde): zhes bgyi/ /rnam grol gang du mchi bar 'gyur/ /gang la 'ching zhing gang dag dgrol/ /bsam gtan spyod yul ji lta ba/ /ci slad theg pa gsum po mchis/ /bdag la bstan
308b5(mdo sde): cing bshad du gsol/ /rkyen rnams gang las skye ba lags/ /byed dang byas pa ji lta bu/ /gnyis ka tha dad ci slad bshad/ /ji lta bur na 'phel ba lags/ /gzugs med snyoms
308b6(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dang / /'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug ji lta bu/ /'du shes 'gog pa ji lta bu/ /ting nge 'dzin las ji ltar sad/ /ci yi slad du byas pa 'byung / /'gro ba dang ni lus 'dzin
308b7(mdo sde): ci| |ji ltar rnam rtog snang bar 'gyur/ /sa rnams ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /srid gsum 'jig pa de su zhig /gnas ni gang lags lus ni ci/ /skye gnas gang du bgrod par
309a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ /rgyal ba'i sras su ji ltar 'gyur/ /mngon par shes dang dbang rnams dang / /ting 'dzin rnams ni ji ltar 'thob/ /ting 'dzin sems
309a2(mdo sde): ni ji lta bu/ /rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol/ /ci slad kun gzhi zhes bgyi lags/ /yid dang rnam shes ji lta bu/ /skye dang 'jig pa ji lta bu/ /ji ltar mthong nas slar
309a3(mdo sde): yang ldog / ji lta bur na rigs su 'gyur/ /rigs ma mchis dang sems tsam dang / /sgro 'dogs mtshan nyid ji lta bu/ /bdag med don du ji ltar 'gyur/ /sems can ma
309a4(mdo sde): mchis ji lta bu/ /kun rdzob bshad pa ji lta bu/ /ji ltar rtag dang chad pa yi/ /lta ba rab tu 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas mu stegs dag /mtshan nyid rnams kyis 'gal
309a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar ma 'ongs dus dag na/ /sde ba tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar stong nyid rgyu ci yis/ /ji ltar skad cig 'jig par 'gyur/ /mngal gyi snying por ji
309a6(mdo sde): ltar skye/ /ji ltar 'jig rten gyis mi g.yos/ /ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra/ /de bzhin dri za'i grong khyer dang / /'jig rten smig rgyu lta bu dang / /chu zla dang ni 'od dag dang / /
309a7(mdo sde): byang chub yan lag ci slad gsungs/ /de bzhin byang chub phyogs rnams kyang / /yul rnams ci slad 'khrug par 'gyur/ /ci slad srid par lta bar bgyid/ /ji ltar skye 'gag
309b1(mdo sde): ma mchis shing / /'jig rten nam mkha' me tog 'dra/ /'jig rten ji ltar thugs su chud/ /ci slad yi ge bral bar gsung / /rnam rtog spangs pa de su lags/ /ji ltar nam
309b2(mdo sde): mkha' 'dra ba lags/ /de kho na la du zhig mchis/ /pha rol phyin sems rnam pa du/ /rgyu gang gis ni sa rnams sgrol/ /len ma mchis par su zhig mchi/ /bdag med rnam
309b3(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhig lags/ /shes bya ji ltar rnam par 'dag /ye shes dag ni rnam pa du/ /tshul khrims sems can nyid ni du/ /nor bu mu tshig la sogs pa'i/ /rigs
309b4(mdo sde): rnams su yis rab tu bskyed/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /brjod pa dag ni su yis bskyed/ /rigs pa'i gnas dang bzo yi rnams/ /su yis ji ltar rab tu
309b5(mdo sde): bstan/ /tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa du/ /tshig bcad ring thung ji lta bu/ /rigs pa rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /ci yi slad du smra zhes bgyi/ /skom dang zas rnams ji ltar
309b6(mdo sde): 'byung / /ji ltar sred pa'i 'dod pa 'byung / /ci slad rgyal po zhes bgyi lags/ /'khor los bsgyur dang rgyal phran ci/ /yul ni ji ltar bsrung bar bgyi/ /lha yi ris la rnam
309b7(mdo sde): pa du| |ci yi slad du sa zhes bgyi/ /gza' skar nyi zla ji lta bu/ /thar pa dang ni rnal 'byor pa/ /de dag rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /slob ma rnam pa du zhig mchis/ /slob dpon
310a1(mdo sde): du yang ji ltar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa du zhig lags/ /skyes pa'i rabs la rnam pa du/ /bdud dang slob pa'i bye brag rnams/ /de dag la ni
310a2(mdo sde): rnam pa du/ /rang bzhin dang ni sems rnams kyang / /de dag la ni du zhig mchis/ /btags pa tsam yang ji lta bu/ /rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol/ /nam mkha' sprin
310a3(mdo sde): rlung ji lta bu/ /dran dang yid gzhungs gsal ba ci/ /nags tshal shing ni ji lta bu/ /'khri shing dag ni ci las gyur/ /glang po rta dang ri dwags rnams/ /ji ltar gzung du
310a4(mdo sde): rung bar 'gyur/ /ngan pa'i rnams ji lta bu/ /rgyu gang gis ni ngan par 'gyur/ /tshig drug gis ni ji ltar bsdus/ /'dod chen par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ /skyes pa bdu
310a5(mdo sde): med ma ning rnams/ /de dag thams cad ci slad 'byung / /rnal 'byor las ni ji ltar ldog /rnal 'byor ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pas ni chos gang gis/ /ci 'dra'i
310a6(mdo sde): gang zag rnam par 'jog / sems can 'gro bar skye ba rnams/ mtshan nyid mtshan ma'i rnam pa ci/ /phyug por gyur pa ji lta bu/ /rgyu gang gis ni phyug por 'gyur/ /shAkya'i rigs
310a7(mdo sde): ni ji lta bu/ /ci yi rgyu yis shAkya byung / /bu ram shing pa ji ltar byung / /bla med gtso bos bshad du gsol/ /yun ring dka' thub drang srong gang / /des ni ji ltar rjes su ston//
310b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa zhing rnams su/ /mtshan dang de bzhin gzugs sna tshogs/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor ba yang / /ci yi slad du kun na gda'/ /ci slad sha rnams
310b2(mdo sde): gsol mi mdzad/ /ci slad sha ni rab tu bkag /sha za'i rigs su skyes pa rnams/ /rgyu gang gis ni sha 'tshal lags/ /nyi zla'i dbyibs shing ji lta bu/ /ri rab pad+ma 'dra ba dang //
310b3(mdo sde): seng ge mtshan mchog zhing dag dang / /'jig rten gzur gnas spyi'u tshugs dang / /dbang po'i dra ba 'dra ba dang / /kha cig rin chen kun gyi zhing / /dgu po rgyud mang rnga 'dra
310b4(mdo sde): dang | |me tog sna tshogs dbyibs 'dra dang / /kha cig nyi zla'i 'od dang bral/ /'dri la sogs pa tshad ma mchis/ /sbrul pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta bu/ /rnam smin las byung sangs
310b5(mdo sde): rgyas dang / /de bzhin nyid kyi sangs rgyas ci/ /ye shes sangs rgyas ji lta bu/ /ci slad 'dod pa'i khams rnams su/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ /ci yi slad du 'og min
310b6(mdo sde): pa| |chags bral khrod du byang chub brnyes/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das nas ni/ /yang dag bstan pa su zhig 'dzin/ /lha yi ston pa ji srid bzhugs/ /yang dag chos ni ji srid
310b7(mdo sde): gnas/ /grub mtha' dang ni lta pa yang / /de dag la ni rnam pa du/ /'dul ba dang ni dge slong ris/ /ci slad rgyu dang rkyen ni gang / /rgyal ba'i sras ni de dag dang / /rang rgyal
311a1(mdo sde): dang ni nyan thos dag/ /rgyu gang gis na 'gyur brgyar 'gyur/ /rgyu gang gis ni snang med brgya/ /'jig rten mngon shes ji lta bu/ /'jig rten
311a2(mdo sde): 'das kyi'ang ji lta bu/ /sems ni sa rnams bdun por yang / /ji ltar ci slad bdag la gsungs/ /dge 'dun la ni rnam pa du/ /ji ltar dge 'dun dben du 'gyur/ /sems
311a3(mdo sde): can gso ba'i bstan bcos rnams/ /de dag rgyu rkyen gang gis lags/ /ci slad thub pa chen po yis/ /'od srung 'khor ba 'jig dang ni/ /gser thub kyang ni nga yin zhes/ /de skad
311a4(mdo sde): du ni bka' yang stsal/ /ci slad rtag dang chad pa dang / /de bzhin bdag dang bdag med gsungs/ /ci slad du ni thams cad du/ /yang dag don ni gsung mi mdzad/ /sems
311a5(mdo sde): can dag gi slad du yang / /sems tsam du ni dbye ba mdzad/ /ci slad skyes bu na chung tshal/ /a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/ /ke la sa dang khor yug ri/ /rdo rje la sogs ri bo rnams/ /
311a6(mdo sde): rin chen sna tshogs rab brgyan cing / /drang srong dri zas kun gang ba/ /ji ltar ci slad bdag la gsungs/ /bla med 'jig rten mkhyen pa yis/ /theg chen sgrol ba'i sgo rnams dang //
311a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po mchog /de yi tshigs bcad gsan pa dang / /legs so dris pa rab tu legs/ /blo gros chen po legs par nyon/ /ngas ni der 'dir rim
311b1(mdo sde): bzhin du/ /khyod kyis gang dris bshad par bya/ /skye dang skye ba med pa dang / /mya ngan 'das stong skad cig ma/ /rang bzhin med la 'jug par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin rnams
311b2(mdo sde): dang | |rgyal sras dang ni nyan thos dang / /rang rgyal mu stegs can rnams dang / /gzugs med pa yi spyod rnams dang / /de bzhin dngos po sna tshogs rnams/ /ri rab mtsho bran ri
311b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / /gling dang zhing dang sa rnams dang / /gza' skar nyi ma zla ba dang / /mu stegs lha dang lha ma yin/ /rnam thar dbang dang mngon shes dang / /stobs dang bsam gtan
311b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin/ /'gog dang rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang / /byang chub yan lag lam gyi phyogs/ /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med dang / /phung po lus rnams 'gro 'ong dang / /snyoms
311b5(mdo sde): par 'jug dang 'gog pa dang / /ting 'dzin ldang sems bshad pa dang / /sems dang yid dang rnam shes dang / /bdag med pa dang chos lnga dang / /rang bzhin rtog dang brtag pa
311b6(mdo sde): dang | |snang dang lta ba gnyis po dang / /theg pa dang ni rigs rnams dang / /gser dngul nor bu la sogs dang / /'dod chen pa dang 'byung chen dang / /dkrugs ma dag dang sangs
311b7(mdo sde): rgyas gcig / shes dang shes bya 'jug thob dang / /sems can srid dang mi srid dang / /glang po rta dang ri dwags rnams/ /ci yi phyir na gzung du rung / /dpe dang rgyu dang grub
312a1(mdo sde): mtha' dang / /byed pa dang ni byas pa rnams/ /nags tshal nang la mngon shes dang / /sems can de ni snang ba med/ /sa rnams rim gyis 'pho ba med//
312a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba brgya po snang med brgya/ /gso ba'i bstan bcos bzo rnams dang / /sgyu rtsal dang ni rig pa'i gnas/ /ri bo ri rab sa dag dang / /rgya mtsho nyi ma zla ba'i tshad/ /sems
312a3(mdo sde): can rab 'bring tha ma yi/ /lus la rdul ni du zhig yod/ /zhing dang zhing la rdul du zhig /gzhu dang gzhu la ji snyed yod/ /khru dang gom pa rgyang grags dang / /dpag tshad phyed
312a4(mdo sde): dang dpag tshad la/ /ri bong nyi zer sa ma dang / /lug gi dang ni nas kyang du/ /bre gang la ni nas 'bru du/ /bre phyed la yang nas 'bru du/ /bre bo gang dang bcu dag la/ /grangs 'bum
312a5(mdo sde): dang ni bye ba dang / /de bzhin du ni shu rdog la/ /de dag grangs ni du zhig yod/ /rdul phran dag ni du zhig yod/ /rdul phran dag ni du zhig la/ /yungs kar 'bru ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /yungs kar 'bru
312a6(mdo sde): ni du zhig gis/ /'ol ma se ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /'ol ma se ni du zhig la/ /ma sha 'bru ni gcig tu 'gyur/ /ma sha du la nam ni gcig /nam du la ni srang du 'gyur/ /spang
312a7(mdo sde): gcig la yang zho du yod/ /rtsis kyi rtsis mgo 'di lta bur/ /ri rab srang ni du yod ces/ /'di la sogs pa'i dri ba'i rigs/ /ci yi phyir na dngos gzhan 'dri/ /nyan thos
312b1(mdo sde): thos dang ni rang rgyal dang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras kyi/ /sku la rdul phran du yod ces/ /de skad ci'i phyir 'dri mi byed/ /me lce la ni rdul phran du/ /rlung la yang ni rdul phran du//
312b2(mdo sde): dbang po gcig cing rdul phran du/ /smin ma spu yi bu ga du/ /nor srung dbang phyug rgyal po dang / /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yang / /rgyal srid dag ni ji ltar bsrung / /de dag
312b3(mdo sde): ji ltar thar bar 'gyur/ /tshigs bcad rkyang pa ji ltar smra/ /khyod kyis ji ltar zhus pa bzhin/ /sems can 'khrig pa sna tshogs dang / /zas skom rnam pa mang po dang / /ji ltar
312b4(mdo sde): skyes bu na chung tshal/ /rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i ri/ /ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra/ /ri dwags skom gyis gdungs pa ltar/ /ji ltar ri bo drang srong lta/ /dri zas rab tu brgyan pa dang //
312b5(mdo sde): grol ba gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bcings pa su zhig gang gis 'grol/ /bsam gtan pa yi yul ni gang / /sprul pa dang ni mu stegs kyang / /ci phyir med pa'i rgyu las byed/ /
312b6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir yod pa'i rgyu las byed/ /yod med rgyu las byed pa dang / /de bzhin yod med min pa'i rgyu/ /snang ba las ni ji ltar ldog /rtog ge ji ltar yongs su 'dag /rtog ge ji
312b7(mdo sde): ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ /byed pa ci yis 'jug par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'du shes gcad par bya/ /ji ltar ting nge 'dzin las ldang / /srid gsum bcom pa de su zhig /gnas
313a1(mdo sde): gang de yi lus kyang ci/ /ci phyir sems can med bzhin du/ /bdag yod par ni rjod par byed/ /kun rdzob bstan pa ji lta bu/ /rgya cher rab tu dbyer
313a2(mdo sde): gsol zhes/ /mtshan nyid 'dri ba ci yi phyir/ /bdag med 'dri ba ji lta bu/ /ji ltar mngal gyi snying por skye/ /lus ni tha dad sna tshogs dang / /rtag chad lta ba ji lta bu/ /
313a3(mdo sde): ji ltar sems ni mnyam par 'jog /brjod dang de bzhin ye shes dang / /tshul khrims rigs dang rgyal ba'i sras/ /rigs pa dang ni smra ba'ang ci/ /slob dpon slob ma
313a4(mdo sde): ji lta bu/ /sems can rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /'di la sogs pa ji lta bu/ /zas dang skom ni ji lta bu/ /yid gzhungs bdud dang btags pa tsam/ /shing dang 'khri
313a5(mdo sde): shing ci phyir zhes/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis dri ba'i rigs/ /zhing rnams sna tshogs ci yi phyir/ /drang srong yun ring dka' thub dang / /rigs zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ /bla ma gang
313a6(mdo sde): las bslab pa blang / /ci yi phyir na mi dag ngan/ /ci yi phyir na rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa'i khams su 'tshang mi rgya/ /'og min du ni grub pa'i mtha'/ /ci phyir mngon shes
313a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa/ /ci phyir dge slong zhes ni brjod/ /sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta bu/ /rnam smin sangs rgyas ji lta bu/ /de bzhin nyid kyi sangs rgyas gang / /mnyam nyid ye
313b1(mdo sde): shes sangs rgyas dang / /dge 'dun rnams kyang ji lta bu/ /rgyal sras de bzhin dri ba'i rigs/ /dgu bo rgyud mang me tog rnga/ /zhing dang snang ba spangs pa dang / /sems tsam sa
313b2(mdo sde): ni bdun po dag / dris pa rnams ni yang dag nyid/ /'di dang gzhan yang rab mang ba'i/ /dri ba dag ni rgyal sras dris/ /re re mtshan nyid rab ldan zhing / /lta ba'i nyes pa rnam
313b3(mdo sde): spangs pa/ /grub mtha'i brjod dang bral ba ste/ /ngas ni da 'dir bstan par bya/ /go rims rnam par bzhag pa'i tshig /rgyal ba'i sras kyis legs par nyon/ /tshig brgya rtsa
313b4(mdo sde): brgyad 'di dag ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs bzhin bshad/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
313b5(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das tshig brgya rtsa brgyad po dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba'i tshig dang / mi skye ba'i tshig dang / rtag pa'i tshig
313b6(mdo sde): dang | mi rtag pa'i tshig dang / mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i tshig dang / gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'i tshig dang / gnas pa gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i
313b7(mdo sde): tshig dang / skad cig pa'i tshig dang / skad cig ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rang bzhin gyi tshig dang / rang bzhin dang bral ba'i tshig dang / stong pa nyid kyi tshig dang / stong pa nyid
314a1(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i tshig dang / chad pa'i tshig dang / chad pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sems kyi tshig dang / sems ma yin pa'i tshig dang / mtha'i tshig
314a2(mdo sde): dang | mtha' ma yin pa'i tshig dang / dbu ma'i tshig dang / dbu ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / ther zug gi tshig dang / ther zug ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rkyen gyi tshig dang / rkyen
314a3(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rgyu'i tshig dang / rgyu ma yin pa'i tshig dang / nyon mongs pa'i tshig dang / nyon mongs pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sred pa'i tshig dang / sred pa ma yin
314a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / thabs kyi tshig dang / thabs ma yin pa'i tshig dang / mkhas pa'i tshig dang / mkhas pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / dag pa'i tshig dang / dag pa ma yin pa'i
314a5(mdo sde): tshig dang / rigs pa'i tshig dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / dpe'i tshig dang / dpe ma yin pa'i tshig dang / slob ma'i tshig dang / slob ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / bla
314a6(mdo sde): ma'i tshig dang / bla ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rigs kyi tshig dang / rigs ma yin pa'i tshig dang / theg pa gsum gyi tshig dang / theg pa gsum ma yin pa'i tshig dang /
314a7(mdo sde): srid pa'i tshig dang / srid pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / smon pa'i tshig dang / smon pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / 'khor lo gsum gyi tshig dang / 'khor lo gsum ma yin
314b1(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / mtshan ma'i tshig dang / mtshan ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / yod pa'i phyogs kyi tshig dang / /yod pa'i phyogs ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gnyis ka'i tshig dang / gnyis
314b2(mdo sde): ka ma yin pa'i tshig dang / so so rang gi 'phags pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i tshig dang / mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa ma
314b3(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig dang / zhing gi tshig dang / zhing ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rdul gyi tshig dang / rdul ma yin pa'i tshig dang / chu'i tshig dang / chu ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzhu'i tshig dang /
314b4(mdo sde): gzhu ma yin pa'i tshig dang / yang dag pa'i tshig dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / grangs kyi tshig dang / grangs ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rtsis kyi tshig dang / rtsis ma yin
314b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshig dang / mngon par gsal ba'i tshig dang / mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / nam mkha'i tshig dang / nam mkha' ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sprin gyi tshig
314b6(mdo sde): dang | sprin ma yin pa'i tshig dang / bzo dang sgyu rtsal dang rig pa'i gnas kyi tshig dang / bzo dang sgyu rtsal dang rig pa'i gnas ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rlung gi tshig dang / rlung ma
314b7(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig dang / sa'i tshig dang / sa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sems kyi tshig dang / sems ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa'i tshig dang / gdags pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang /
315a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyi tshig dang / rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig dang / phung po'i tshig dang / phung po ma yin pa'i tshig dang / sems can gyi tshig dang /
315a2(mdo sde): sems can ma yin pa'i tshig dang / blo'i tshig dang / blo ma yin pa'i tshig dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshig dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / shes
315a3(mdo sde): bya'i tshig dang / shes bya ma yin pa'i tshig dang / mu stegs can gyi tshig dang / mu stegs can ma yin pa'i tshig dang / khrag khrug gi tshig dang / khrag khrug ma yin pa'i tshig
315a4(mdo sde): dang | sgyu ma'i tshig dang / sgyu ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rmi lam gyi tshig dang / rmi lam ma yin pa'i tshig dang / smig rgyu'i tshig dang / smig rgyu ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gzugs
315a5(mdo sde): brnyan gyi tshig dang / gzugs brnyan ma yin pa'i tshig dang / 'khor lo'i tshig dang / 'khor lo ma yin pa'i tshig dang / dri za'i tshig dang / dri za ma yin pa'i tshig dang / lha'i
315a6(mdo sde): tshig dang / lha ma yin pa'i tshig dang / zas skom gyi tshig dang / zas skom ma yin pa'i tshig dang / 'khrig pa'i tshig dang / 'khrig pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / lta ba'i tshig
315a7(mdo sde): dang | lta ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig dang / pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / tshul khrims kyi tshig dang / tshul khrims ma yin pa'i tshig
315b1(mdo sde): dang | nyi zla skar ma'i tshig dang / nyi zla skar ma ma yin pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa ma yin pa'i tshig dang / 'bras bu'i tshig dang / 'bras bu ma yin pa'i
315b2(mdo sde): tshig dang / 'gog pa las ldang ba'i tshig dang / 'gog pa las ldang ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / gso ba'i tshig dang / gso ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / mtshan nyid kyi tshig dang /
315b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i tshig dang / yan lag gi tshig dang / yan lag ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa'i tshig dang / rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa ma
315b4(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig dang / bsam gtan gyi tshig dang / bsam gtan ma yin pa'i tshig dang / nor ba'i tshig dang / nor ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / snang ba'i tshig dang / snang ba ma
315b5(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig dang / bsrung ba'i tshig dang / bsrung ba ma yin pa'i tshig dang / rus kyi tshig dang / rus ma yin pa'i tshig dang / drang srong gi tshig dang / drang srong ma yin pa'i
